ai-mil3.6.10:1.2_0: “Venerable Sir, did you remember any of the past in the past?”
ai-mil3.6.10:1.5_0: “Great king, do you recall having done some business, great king?”
ai-mil3.6.10:1.7_0: “Great king, at that time are you so wise?”
ai-mil3.6.10:1.8_0: “But at that time there’s no coming.”
ai-mil3.6.10:1.9_0: “Great king, why don’t you say this:
ai-mil3.6.10:1.10_0: ‘We are with a mind full of mindfulness.’”
ai-mil3.6.10:3.1_0: The tenth enquiry was made for a long time,
